    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        <T extends Component> Optional<T> getComponent(String path,
                                             Class<T> type)
        Get a component instance for the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - absolute JCR path to the resource of the component
        type - component class type
        Returns:
        component instance or absent Optional if path does not resolve to a resource

      • getComponent

        <T extends Component> T getComponent(ComponentNode componentNode,
                                   Class<T> type)
        Get a component instance for the given component node.
        Parameters:
        componentNode - component node representing resource of desired component
        type - component class type
        Returns:
        component instance or null if an error occurs

        <T> T getService(Class<T> serviceType)
        Get an OSGi service.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        serviceType - the type (class) of the service
        Returns:
        the service instance, or null if it is not available

      • getServices

        <T> List<T> getServices(Class<T> serviceType,
                      String filter)
        Get one or more OSGi services.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        serviceType - the type (class) of the service
        filter - optional filter, see OSGi spec for syntax details
        Returns:
        one or more service instances, or null if none are found
